snippet.title: Windy Meadow: A Roadwarden Tale - Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description: Windy Meadow - A Roadwarden Tale is a decision-based visual novel narrative adventure that seamlessly weaves coziness and melancholy. Featuring a multitude of hand-crafted characters and a richly detailed village in a fantasy setting set in the Roadwarden story world, players are submerged in the day-to-day goings on of this small community. Windy Meadow - A Roadwarden Tale is packed with heart-warming dramatic scenes and an atmospheric musical score. Windy Meadow - A Roadwarden Tale will be released on PC, Mac, and Linux in Fall 2023 with a demo available now on Itch.io and a Steam demo in early April.
